set action - About to call BCM lookup for COUNTRY

SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Check to see if Siebel sent an employee as Technician

set the error info : About to publish CustomerContact to Broker

SEQUENCE.NAME: LDAP
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: If source system is LDAP - Create/Update Contact in Siebel and send Siebel Id to LDAP if needed

MAP.COMMENT: set the error info : About to invoke "LXKCustomerContactToSiebel.main:processCustomerContact"

SEQUENCE.NAME: SERVICES WEB PORTAL
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: When Source system is Services Web Portal - Create/Update Contact in Siebel and send Siebel Id to LDAP if needed

MAP.COMMENT: set the error info : About to invoke "LXKCustomerContactToSiebel.main:processCustomerContact"

SEQUENCE.NAME: SIEBEL
